pathing.door_transition: When reaching a door tile, teleport to the corresponding interior or exterior map.

rules.name: avoid_buildings
rules.description: NPCs cannot walk through building tiles; they must navigate around obstacles using the collision map.

rules.name: prefer_roads
rules.description: NPCs will prefer walkway tiles (ID 1) if available, but may walk on grass when necessary.

rules.name: stop_for_interaction
rules.description: When interacting with the player or another NPC, stop moving and face the interaction partner until the interaction ends.
